body_html:
Hi,

From version 1.4, TF will depend on scipy, then the user should either have a FORTRAN compiler or get it from a third-party python distribution (e.g. Anaconda). We need document this.
body_text:
Hi,
From version 1.4,  TF will depend on scipy, then the user should either have a FORTRAN compiler or get it from a third-party python distribution (e.g. Anaconda).  We need document this.
body:
Hi, 

From version 1.4,  TF will depend on scipy, then the user should either have a FORTRAN compiler or get it from a third-party python distribution (e.g. Anaconda).  We need document this.
